snippet: Invisible Children released a sequel to its "Kony 2012" viral video on Thursday as part of its campaign calling for the arrest and capture of the African warlord Joseph Kony.
abstract: Invisible Children released a sequel to its "Kony 2012" viral video on Thursday as part of its campaign calling for the arrest and capture of the African warlord Joseph Kony.

headline.main: Sequel to 'Kony 2012' Video Addresses Critics and Outlines Call for Action
